articles.description: Aryna Sabalenka’s service struggles continued but she still had enough to defeat Marketa Vondrousova
articles.content:
Aryna Sabalenka threw her hands into the air, clapped them together and then punched the sky. Im really happy, she said, and mostly really happy that I made only 10 double-faults.
She was laughing, … [+4470 chars]

articles.title: ‘Dreamt of it since I was a kid’: Demon’s heartwarming reason for ‘109’ tattoo - Fox Sports
articles.description: ‘Dreamt of it since I was a kid’: Demon’s heartwarming reason for ‘109’ tattoo
articles.content:
Alex de Minaur has explained the reason behind his 109 tattoo and paid tribute to Rod Laver in a heartwarming post-match interview on Saturday night.
